entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:13 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
